name: InfluxDB 2 Sink
shortDescription: Consume data from a Kafka topic in Quix and persist the data to an InfluxDB 2 database.

Variables.Name: INFLUXDB_HOST
Variables.Description: Host address for the InfluxDB instance.

Variables.Name: INFLUXDB_MEASUREMENT_NAME
Variables.Description: The InfluxDB measurement to write data to. If not specified, the name of the input topic will be used

Variables.Name: INFLUXDB_BUCKET
Variables.Description: Bucket name in InfluxDB where data should be stored.

Variables.Name: INFLUXDB_TAG_KEYS
Variables.Description: The tags to include when writing the measurement data

Variables.Name: INFLUXDB_FIELD_KEYS
Variables.Description: The fields to include when writing the measurement data

Variables.Name: CONSUMER_GROUP_NAME
Variables.Description: The name of the consumer group to use when consuming from Kafka

Variables.Name: TIMESTAMP_COLUMN
Variables.Description: The column containing the timestamp column. NOTE: Must be nanoseconds
